rules_text:
When Berry Blenders enters, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
Decompose into Clue {1}{G} [i]({1}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that’s a copy of it, except it’s a colorless Clue artifact with no mana cost and “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card,” and it loses all other card types. Decompose only as a sorcery.)[/i]
notes:
New card — Replaced Voice of the Wilds

With the token payoff moving down to 2 mana, and the 4 mana slot going from an ooze to a nourish card, this slot wants to be a decompose card.
